name: Daruber Muss Man Schweigen
storyline: You wake up from a regular and unsettling dream to your room, with all it's familiar rubbish mounds and pointless clutter. All is normal in your day-to-day routine, that is until a suspicious fault in your augmented AI draws you down into the rabbit hole. Your life is a lie. Nothing is true. Everything should be questioned.
summary: A saucy sci-fi population management game, with lashings of transhumanism and transformation fetishism.
